NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
EXCLUSIVE OPPORTUNITY BECAUSE YOU SAID YES
Hi {!Contact.Name},
We're offering a few young people who have signed up to NCS in East London the chance to be at the Soccer AM Futsal Cup Finals and enjoy all the action and entertainment on the day for FREE.
What is Futsal? Futsal - a modified form of soccer/football played with five players per side on a smaller, typically indoor, pitch.
https://fltfutsal.co.uk/?utm_source=The%20Challenge%20NCS%20email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=Futsal%20Finals
ENTER THE COMPETITION
The SOCCER AM Futsal Finals take place Sun 17 May. You and a mate could be there to see some of the freshest footballing talent plus all the day's entertainment for FREE! To get your pair of tickets just ENTER THE COMPETITION and tell us what you're looking forward to most about NCS.
https://docs.google.com/a/the-challenge.org/forms/d/1bTqZq37QOqP4B07E7rJQXyQ9buOmXqVvKXQxKYigXQ4/viewform?usp=send_form
Note: Only 1x pair of tickets available per NCS participant. Terms & Conditions apply
DON'T FORGET...
Once you've completed NCS there's even more to look forward to; including special events like this one which took place recently at Thorpe Park Resort where young people were invited to an exclusive VIP only, day of rides and meeting celebs. Watch the video below to find out more.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tR6D251CVqQ
